outline:
1. daughter
    1. daughter, girl, adopted daughter, daughter-in-law, sister, granddaughters, female child, cousin
      1. as polite address
      2. as designation of women of a particular place
      3. as personification
      4. daughter-villages
      5. description of character
    2. young women, women
kjv_def: apple (of the eye), branch, company, daughter, [idiom] first, [idiom] old, [phrase] owl, town, village.
strongs_def: a daughter (used in the same wide sense as other terms of relationship, literally and figuratively)
